PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-04682022-05-16HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drugs Regulations (Exports and Transhipments of Drugs)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUGS REGULATIONS (EXPORTS AND TRANSHIPMENTS OF DRUG) in order to prescribe certain requirements to persons conducting licensable activities in respect of drugs intended solely for export such as fabrication, packaging, labelling, testing, distribution and wholesale, complying with good manufacturing practices, and payment of fees in accordance with the Fees Order.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0100 Publication Date: 2022-06-08
AttachmentsAttachment
